TopicTitle: Realchutelite MM patch for all chutes not working with Realchute installed

Articles.Content:
Why is it that when realchute is installed, with FAR, all parachutes that would usually be MM patched (i assume) into realchutes, because FAR comes packaged with realchute lite, but with Realchute (not lite) installed, the parts without realchute configs no longer get patched to be realchutes. any help? 

ex: the big radial parachutes, from the lithobraking exploration mod, i assume, or maybe it was the spaceY mod,  with only FAR installed, the parachutes become realchutes, but with FAR AND realchute, they turn back into normal, stock parachutes.
